channel.title: [Delta 317] Server Freezes on Startup
channel.description:
I was adding the Korasi to my server, using a tutorial [b][u]designed for 317's[/u][/b]. Everything so far succeeded, except when I run the server and log into my account, the screen is black, with all the interfaces, and saying loading please wait in the top right corner. I waited about 25 minutes, and it was still the same. What could be the problem?
[size=3][b][u]EDIT:[/u][/b][/size] I have a feeling I added the models incorrectly. So here's what I did, and please tell me if i'm missing anything. I added the 2 models to the models folder in the client. (Male and female equip models). And I added the ID's to Class8.java. Any tips?
[b] - Thanks, Excel4[/b]

item.title: [Delta 317] Server Freezes on Startup
item.dc:creator: @excel4 excel4
item.description:
@excel4 wrote:

Good Idea, i’ll try that.

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta 317] Server Freezes on Startup
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

woulda just found another 317 with korasi(like teamtorva), and copy everything to do with items.
This is usually what a lot of people do, because we’re “playing it safe”. Lazy/cbf way but it works.

Read full topic
